definition: to go out/to come out/to occur/to produce/to go beyond/to rise/to put forth/to happen/(used after a verb to indicate an outward direction or a positive result)/classifier for dramas, plays, operas etc
to hire/to rent/to charter/to rent out/to lease out/rent/land tax
car/vehicle/CL:輛|辆[liang4]/machine/to shape with a lathe/Kangxi radical 159

sentences.chinese: 我們乘出租汽車到車站去。

sentences.english: The taxi-driver had only three fares this morning.
sentences.chinese: 這個出租汽車司機今天上午只載了三個乘客。

sentences.english: The 'taxi' is a small Swiss aeroplane called a 'Pilatus Porter'.
sentences.chinese: 這輛“出租汽車”是一架小型瑞士飛機。

sentences.english: As we were late we taxied to the stat .
sentences.chinese: 因爲我們晚了，乘出租汽車赴車站。

sentences.english: Where's a taxi stand around here?
sentences.chinese: 這附近哪兒有出租汽車站？

sentences.english: Somehow the taxi-driver kept glancing at the milometer.
sentences.chinese: 不知怎麼回事，出租汽車司機不停地瞟一眼裏程表。

sentences.english: My name is Wang Wei. I am from the Capital Taxi Company.
sentences.chinese: 我是王巍，首都出租汽車公司的司機。

sentences.english: If you want to ensure that you catch the plane,take a taxi.
sentences.chinese: 如果你想確保趕上航班，那就叫輛出租汽車。

sentences.english: The taxi-driver tried to overcharge her.
sentences.chinese: 出租汽車司機想多收她的車錢。

sentences.english: My name is Zhang Hong, and I'm a taxi driver of taiyuan Taxi Company.
sentences.chinese: 我叫張虹，是太原市出租汽車公司的司機。

sentences.english: He was bowed into a taxi.
sentences.chinese: 他被恭敬地接進了出租汽車。

sentences.english: I employ to be a waiter, but here I'm a taxi-dsea.
sentences.chinese: 我過去是個侍者，但目前我是出租汽車司機。

sentences.english: All visitors have been safely taxied to the hotel.
sentences.chinese: 所有的客人由出租汽車安然送到旅館。

sentences.english: Please call a taxi round for me.
Taxis in Finland are mostly high-class Benz with a fare of two US dollars a kilometer.
sentences.chinese: 出租汽車在芬蘭是與二美元車費的主要高級苯每公里。

sentences.english: Many taxis were cruising in the downtown area.
sentences.chinese: 很多出租汽車在市區內緩緩行駛以招攬生意。

definition: to break the rules/to violate regulations
State-owned Assets Supervision and Administration Commission SASAC
pinyin: Guo2 you3 Zi1 chan3 Jian1 du1 Guan3 li3 Wei3 yuan2 hui4
related.word: 國有資產監督管理委員會

definition: to be reimbursed for actual expenses
(international trade) documentation (e.g. a bill of lading)
